subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Another plane prediction?

 Seems the birds got scarred of fire works, they were too close too, and fi=
sh got into something where they caught a bad infection, at least this is w=
hat it sounds like now.=C2=A0 Thing is many of the birds were landing on ho=
use tops, and it was in 2 different states, more fish were found on the Mar=
yland side too as well as down south,=C2=A0 When, I asked the question in a=
ll these years of fireworks, birds didn't seem to be bothered,=C2=A0 But, n=
ow he says it was because they were too close this year, still strange. sf
=

 



-----Original Message-----
From: draiga1 <mail@...&=
gt;

          =C2=A0                    =
              I don't know what's going on, but it's getting creepy. 
 
 ~D=
raiga
 
 --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@...> w=
rote:
 >
 > A bomb in the upper atmosphere would cover a very wide ra=
nge. It would also
 > not go unnoticed.
 > 
 > I have seen specula=
tion of testing of an electromagnetic weapon such as the
 > millimeter-w=
ave devices talked about a year or so ago in various places.
 > These wo=
uld be aimed at a specific target area that would not be too big. It
 > =
would not be noticed by anyone.
 > 
 > Zack
 > 
 >
 
 
      
 =

<div style=3D"font-family: arial; color: black; font-size: 10pt;"> Seems t=
he birds got scarred of fire works, they were too close too, and fish got i=
nto something where they caught a bad infection, at least this is what it s=
ounds like now.  Thing is many of the birds were landing on house tops=
, and it was in 2 different states, more fish were found on the Maryland si=
de too as well as down south,  When, I asked the question in all these=
 years of fireworks, birds didn't seem to be bothered,  But, now he sa=
ys it was because they were too close this year, still strange. sf<br>
</di=
v>

<div> <br>
</div>

<div><br>
</div>
